name: neon-holdem-monorepo
description: Neon Hold'em Pro monorepo (client, server, shared)

scripts.build: npm run build -w packages/shared && npm run build -w packages/server && npm run build -w packages/client
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w packages/server" "npm run dev -w packages/client"
scripts.lint: concurrently "npm run lint -w packages/shared" "npm run lint -w packages/server" "npm run lint -w packages/client"
scripts.format: concurrently "npm run format -w packages/shared" "npm run format -w packages/server" "npm run format -w packages/client"
scripts.test: concurrently "npm run test -w packages/shared" "npm run test -w packages/server"
